text: @SecPompeo Pompeo claimed coronavirus originated in a Chinese laboratory – but did not provide any evidence. US intelligence had issued  statement saying scientific consensus virus not manmade/genetically modified. When reminded of this, he replied: ‘That’s right. I agree with that.’🤡
